fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Summon a rainstorm at one player's house each night, drenching your target and all visitors.
- Summon a hurricane, attacking any drenched players who go outside that night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will know how many players are drenched but not which.
- Players are notified when you drench them.
- Players are drenched for two nights after you target them.
- Players are no longer drenched after you summon a hurricane.
- With the Necronomicon, you will attack your target when summoning a rainstorm.
- You may talk to other members of the Coven at night.
